verses.text: Ephraim \f + \fr 12:1 \ft That is, the northern kingdom of Israel; also in verses 8 and 14\f* chases \w the|strong="H5437"\w* wind \w and|strong="H3063"\w* pursues \w the|strong="H5437"\w* east wind \w all|strong="H5437"\w* day \w long|strong="H5750"\w*; \w he|strong="H1004"\w* multiplies \w lies|strong="H3585"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* violence; \w he|strong="H1004"\w* makes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Assyria \w and|strong="H3063"\w* sends olive oil \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Egypt.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w* brings \w a|strong="H3068"\w* charge \w against|strong="H5973"\w* Judah. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* punish Jacob \f + \fr 12:2 \ft Jacob means he grasps the heel or he deceives.\f* according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* ways \w and|strong="H3117"\w* repay \w him|strong="H5973"\w* according \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w deeds|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* womb \w he|strong="H3068"\w* grasped \w his|strong="H3068"\w* brother’s heel, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w vigor|strong="H5973"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* wrestled \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

Yes, he struggled \w with|strong="H8280"\w* the angel \f + \fr 12:4 \ft Or Angel\f* and prevailed; he wept and sought \w His|strong="H6117"\w* favor; he found Him at Bethel and spoke \w with|strong="H8280"\w* Him there \f + \fr 12:4 \ft LXX and Syriac; MT and there He spoke with us\f*—

\w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w of|strong="H4397"\w* Hosts— \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w His|strong="H4672"\w* name \w of|strong="H4397"\w* renown.

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* you must return \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, maintaining love \w and|strong="H3068"\w* justice, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* always \w waiting|strong="H6635"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w A|strong="H3068"\w* merchant loves \w to|strong="H7725"\w* defraud \w with|strong="H7725"\w* dishonest scales \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* hands.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* Ephraim boasts: “How rich \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w become|strong="H3027"\w*! \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* found wealth \w for|strong="H3027"\w* myself. \w In|strong="H3027"\w* all \w my|strong="H3027"\w* labors, \w they|strong="H3027"\w* can find \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H3027"\w* no iniquity \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* sinful.”

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w* since \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3605"\w* Egypt. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* again make \w you|strong="H3605"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H4672"\w* tents, \w as|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* appointed feast.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* spoke through \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets \w and|strong="H3068"\w* multiplied \w their|strong="H3068"\w* visions; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* gave parables through \w the|strong="H3068"\w* prophets.

\w Is|strong="H3027"\w* there iniquity \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Gilead? \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* surely come \w to|strong="H1696"\w* nothing. \w Do|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* sacrifice bulls \w in|strong="H5921"\w* Gilgal? Indeed, \w their|strong="H5921"\w* altars \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* heaps \w of|strong="H3027"\w* stones \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* furrows \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field.

Jacob fled \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* Aram \f + \fr 12:12 \ft That is, northwest Mesopotamia\f* \w and|strong="H4196"\w* Israel worked \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife— \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w he|strong="H5921"\w* tended sheep.

\w But|strong="H3290"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w the|strong="H5647"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out \w of|strong="H7704"\w* Egypt, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* prophet \w he|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w*.

Ephraim \w has|strong="H3068"\w* provoked bitter anger, \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w leave|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* bloodguilt \w upon|strong="H5927"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* repay \w him|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H8104"\w* contempt.
